      • createCheckItem

        private javax.swing.JCheckBoxMenuItem createCheckItem(java.awt.Container c,
                                                      java.lang.String txt,
                                                      boolean selected,
                                                      java.lang.String setting)
        Creates a new check box menu item to the given container
        Parameters:
        c - The container
        txt - Text for the menu item
        selected - Is the check box selected (by default)
        setting - Name of the setting where the check-box-selected true/false value is read from (if not found, the "selected" parameter value is used). If null, no setting is read and the default is used as such.
        Returns:
        The created check box menu item

      • toggleUnderlayImage

        private void toggleUnderlayImage()
        Toggles the showing of underlay image. Image is read from the file only when it is enabled to save some memory.

        private void warn(java.lang.String txt)
